com.joliciel.talismane.filters

Interface Sentence

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    SentenceHolder

    public interface Sentence
    A sentence detected by the sentence detector, including information about the original location of the sentence in the stream being processed, and about any text in the original stream that has been marked for raw inclusion in Talismane's output.
    Author:
    Assaf Urieli

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String WHITE_SPACE 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addNewline(int originalIndex, int lineNumber)
      Indicate that a new line was found at a given original index in this sentence holder, and gives the line number.
      void addOriginalIndex(int originalIndex)
      Add a new original index to the current sentence.
      int getColumnNumber(int originalIndex)
      Returns the column number corresponding to a particular original index inside this sentence, starting at 1.
      File getFile()
      The file containing this sentence.
      String getFileName()
      The file name containing this sentence.
      int getIndex(int originalIndex)
      Get the sentence text index corresponding to the first position following the original index provided.
      String getLeftoverOriginalText()
      Is there any leftover original text?
      int getLineNumber(int originalIndex)
      Returns the line number corresponding to a particular original index inside this sentence, starting at 1.
      Map<Integer,Integer> getNewlines()
      A map giving original index to line number mappings, for all lines contained within this sentence.
      int getOriginalIndex(int index)
      Get the original text index of any character index within this sentence.
      Map<Integer,String> getOriginalTextSegments()
      A map giving any original text segments marked for output.
      Map.Entry<Integer,String> getPrecedingOriginalTextSegment(int index)
      Get the closest original text segment preceding a certain index.
      int getStartLineNumber()
      The line number on which this sentence started, when reading from a previously analysed corpus (one token per line).
      String getText()
      The sentence text.
      boolean isComplete()
      Is this a complete sentence? Default is true.
      void setComplete(boolean complete) 
      void setFile(File file) 
      void setFileName(String fileName) 
      void setLeftoverOriginalText(String originalText)
      Set original text marked for output from a previous sentence holder.
      void setStartLineNumber(int startLineNumber) 
      void setText(String text)

        Returns:

      • getOriginalTextSegments

        Map<Integer,String> getOriginalTextSegments()
        A map giving any original text segments marked for output. The integer gives the index before which the segment needs to be inserted in the processed sentence text. The string gives the actual segment to be inserted.
        Returns:

      • getPrecedingOriginalTextSegment

        Map.Entry<Integer,String> getPrecedingOriginalTextSegment(int index)
        Get the closest original text segment preceding a certain index.
        Parameters:
        index -
        Returns:

      • addOriginalIndex

        void addOriginalIndex(int originalIndex)
        Add a new original index to the current sentence. These need to be added sequentially for every single index in the current sentence.

        Is this a complete sentence? Default is true.
